title: Zygor Guides 4.0.7375 (October 18th, 2013)
description:
Zygor Guides update v4.0.7375, released October 18th, 2013. (Horde and Alliance)



Install instructions: 

1) DO NOT USE THE OFFICIAL ZYGOR LAUNCHER FOR ANY REASON.

2) Extract the .zip and drop the ZygorGuidesViewer folder into your WoW/Interface/Addons folder and overwrite the current installation.


Mac-Only install instructions:

1) Put the ZygorGuidesViewer folder in Hard Drive/Applications/World of Warcraft/Interface/AddOns.

2) (Optional) Open World of Warcraft, login, click the Addons button on the Character Select Screen, make sure Zygor is selected, and check the "Load out of date addons" box. Some users have stated that this step is rarely/never necessary


Changelog:

-------

[B] Events

Hallow's End Quests:

Added a completion step for the quest "Missing Heirlooms"

Added a completion step for the quest "Fencing the Goods"

Added a completion step for the quest "Shopping Around"

Added a completion step for the quest "The Collector's Agent"

Fixed the step with the quest "The Creepy Crate" so that it will no longer skip.

Removed unnecessary Travel step to Darnassus.

Added in tips that help locate different NPCs.

Hallow's End Daily Quests:

Added a tip for the Horde Wickerman step regarding PvP Combat.
